item.title: Why Piper Perabo Was Drawn to Playing the Villain — and Where Her ‘Butterfly’ Character Could Be Headed After That Finale
item.description: Perabo says her role in Prime Video’s action-spy thriller is one she rarely gets to explore, as she muses about her open-ended final scene.

item.title: ‘Y: Marshals’ Adds Seven to Cast; Gil Birmingham, Brecken Merrill, Mo Brings Plenty to Reprise ‘Yellowstone’ Roles

item.title: Annette Bening Joins ‘Yellowstone’ Beth-Rip Spinoff
item.description: The series has also tapped Chad Feehan as showrunner.

item.title: CBS’ ‘Yellowstone’ Spinoff Adds Logan Marshall-Green
item.description: He’ll star opposite Luke Grimes in ‘Y: Marshals,’ which is slated for a midseason premiere.

item.title: CBS’ ‘Yellowstone’ Spinoff Adds Logan Marshall-Green

item.title: Chris Willingham, Film Editor on ’24,’ ‘The X-Files,’ ‘Grimm,’ Dies at 74
item.description: The 1980s TV hit ‘B.J. and the Bear’ was his first editing gig, and he cut an episode of ‘Yellowstone’ in 2019.

item.title: Chris Willingham, Film Editor on ’24,’ ‘The X-Files,’ ‘Grimm,’ Dies at 74
item.description: The 1980s TV hit ‘B.J. and the Bear’ was his first editing gig, and he cut an episode of ‘Yellowstone’ in 2019.

item.title: Why Do the Emmys Hate Taylor Sheridan Shows?
item.description: From ‘Landman’ to ‘1923’ to ‘Yellowstone’ to ‘Tulsa King,’ once again the prolific writer-producer-director’s dramas were almost entirely snubbed.

item.title: Why Do the Emmys Hate Taylor Sheridan Shows?
item.description: From ‘Landman’ to ‘1923’ to ‘Yellowstone’ to ‘Tulsa King,’ once again the prolific writer-producer-director’s dramas were almost entirely snubbed.
